Crisis between colleagues!

Today, a special meeting of the Board of Directors of Tabs the Cat Industries, LLC was called to review a most disturbing matter â€” the repeated and inexplicable disappearance of Chief Feline Officer Rosieâ€™s crunchies.

At various times over the past few weeks, Rosieâ€™s food bowl, which had been previously full, has become empty, and as you can imagine, this caused quite a corporate kerfuffle.

The results of an internal investigation were inconclusive, but Rosie thinks she knows whoâ€™s doing itâ€¦

Since the official investigation was inconclusive, the board hasnâ€™t taken any action, but Rosieâ€™s suspicions have created a lot of tensionâ€¦

Unfortunately for Marnie, she has a lengthy record of snack theft, so her history isnâ€™t doing her any favors.

Plus, she was captured on security footage early this morning in the vicinity of Rosieâ€™s food bowl. When asked about it by the company investigator, Marnie lawyered upâ€¦

I just hope this gets resolved soon because itâ€™s been bad for morale in the office. ðŸ™‚

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
